title: Define Pet Health and Fitness Metrics
description: Determine the key health and fitness parameters to be monitored in pets.

title: Design Wearable Device Hardware
description: Specify the hardware components and their integration to create a wearable device.
dependencies: Define Pet Health and Fitness Metrics

title: Develop Wearable Device Firmware
description: Create the firmware for the wearable device to collect health and fitness data.

title: Develop Mobile Application UI/UX
description: Design and implement the user interface and user experience for the mobile application.
dependencies: Define Pet Health and Fitness Metrics

title: Develop Mobile Application Backend
description: Create the backend for the mobile application to handle data from the wearable device.

title: Integrate Wearable Device with Mobile Application
description: Establish the communication between the wearable device and the mobile application.

title: Establish Data Storage Solution
description: Choose and set up a database for storing pet health data.

title: Perform Security Audit on the System
description: Review and enhance the security measures of the wearable device and mobile application.

title: Test and Validate the System
description: Conduct thorough testing to ensure proper functioning of the wearable device and mobile application.
dependencies: Integrate Wearable Device with Mobile Application

title: Write User Manual for the Wearable Pet Health Monitor
description: Create a user manual detailing how to use the wearable device and mobile application.
